message.raw:
I would re-open this issue and change it to bug, because last night I was testing new "Urban Qualification" world (robotika, ver2509urban0, ea772540-0d21-46b1-86fa-0e80986f4a0a), robots C and D, where C probably never left the staging area and D returned and then circled many times ... but was not able to query origin any more.
328.476000000 ERROR /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:284(Update)] [topics: ] Failed to call pose_from_artifact_origin service, robot may not exist, be outside staging area, or the service is not available.
